name: Frog Candys: Yum-Yum
description:
Play Frog Candys: Yum-Yum and get a lot of pleasure from the game. Play frog, you dodge the various obstacles and enemies, collect candys and a variety of bonuses that will help you in the game. Buy candy at various improvements to your frog. If you are looking for a game Frog Candys: Yum-Yum then this is what you need.

Features:

- Lots of interesting levels
- Almost at every level you will find something new and interesting
- A variety of bonuses (shield, gun, acceleration, etc).
- The variety of enemies
- Availability bosses
- Frog Candys: Yum-Yum
